divs: Sighting DetailsOutside on the deck having a cigarette i noticed a bright seemingly flashing light on the horizon through the trees, we looked at it through binoculars and could definitely make out multiple colored lights around a super bright white light. It was close to the tree line so we thought it was some type of rescue or search helicopter, we watched it over the course of two hours as it slowly and steadily rose in the sky but remaining just as bright and seemingly motionless.
Summary: Super bright star like object with flashing colors
trends: There have been no other sightings in Pocono Pines
This sighting has never been favorited.
